short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Learning Backpack - Online Interactive Library

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Learning Backpack is an online library website for kids to read books and learn online. This Extension serves as a shortcut to the site for people who use The Learning Backpack site regularly.
